content: The Fungiwoman fight is rather difficult, thanks to her unique skills. To begin with, she has a poisonous staff that she will use to smack you. She can also spin around with the staff at very high speeds, creating a swirling vortex of pain that flings you across the battlefield if you get hit by it. She gets dizzy after this attack, giving you a good opportunity to counter with an attack of your own.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Fungiwoman_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Fungiwoman Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Fungiwoman Fight'.
The content is as follows:
The Fungiwoman fight is rather difficult, thanks to her unique skills. To begin with, she has a poisonous staff that she will use to smack you. She can also spin around with the staff at very high speeds, creating a swirling vortex of pain that flings you across the battlefield if you get hit by it. She gets dizzy after this attack, giving you a good opportunity to counter with an attack of your own.
